title.narrative: Technical support for the trained CBOs to animate the CRCs in Cote d'Ivoire

description.narrative: - 15 listening sessions for radio-produced magazines have been organized by the radio clubs, and 15 feedbacks have been formulated to these radio stations. Through regular interactions between CRCs and Radios, the relationship between radio and radio clubs is becoming stronger, and radio clubs are becoming more and more involved in radio life. - 108 persons including 61.11% of women, were mobilized in these CRCs to discuss topics developed in magazines. These participants came from 38 CBOs. The mobilization of men (38. 89%) in listening clubs undoubtedly demonstrates their interest for women causes.

CBOs gathered around the CRCs and having benefited from a training workshop in March, continued to interact with the selected local radio stations. These interactions included not only contributing to the magazine's production, but also the production of feedbacks in response that magazines.
